attributes.action: dedicate the increased revenue raised from doubling APD to environmental projects to mitigate the environmental impact of aviation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The doubling of APD from 1 February 2007 will contribute an additional £900 million a year to the Government's general finances, with APD in total raising some £1.8 billion per annum - none of which is committed to environmental projects. We call upon Gordon Brown and Tony Blair to dedicate this money to projects to mitigate the environmental impacts of aviation.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "dedicate the increased revenue raised from doubling APD to environmental projects to mitigate the environmental impact of aviation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11603.asp
